AI Description: dnaio is a Python library for reading and writing DNA sequences efficiently. It provides high-performance I/O operations for DNA sequence data, allowing for seamless integration into bioinformatics workflows.
Core Features: Efficient Reading & Writing Of DNA Sequences, Compatibility With Various Sequence File Formats, Optimized For High Performance, Integration With Bioinformatics Pipelines
General Tags: Python Library, Bioinformatics, DNA Sequences, Sequence Data
